name: Ferret Highway
description:
Can you talk your way out of a police encounter with minimal dialogue control?

In this game, you get a few seconds to hide all of the suspicious stuff in your car. Then you encounter a dialogue tree where your only options are to be silent or give a random answer. Thus, your dialogue options are Out of Control.

Hint: You have to place your ice cream in a cupholder before you can interact with anything else.

Made in 48 hours for the GMTK Game Jam 2020

There are still some bugs that didn't get fixed and features that are missing.

Art - Kattejuice

Music - MegaMoth

Programming - HTML_Earth
